name: reimpression
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
all the copies of a book that are printed at the same time without any changes being made, after the first time that the book was printed: The increase in production costs made it uncertain whether the reimpression would go ahead. The number of reimpressions is usually indicated on the copyright page.
More examplesFewer examplesA new cover was designed for this reimpression.The spelling error was there in the first printing and in each subsequent reimpression.There have been fifteen reimpressions of the work, and I think that a new edition is now needed.
